recipesJson.name: Honeycomb Custard and Cookies
recipesJson.author: Wildgypsy
recipesJson.description: Custard? Cookies? Who doesn’t like custard and cookies!? This was one of my first recipes using VT Honeycomb.....and probably my most successful. If you don’t have Custard Premium(I’m sorry), then use INW Custard @1.5% and TFA Butter @0.5%.....close, but not quite as good. Mix it, love it. Let me know how y’all like it.

reviews.text: Well done, this is really tasty! Very well balanced. I let it steep for almost 3 weeks and it hits the spot.
